import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Stack, Text, Container, Box, Accordion, Radio, Group, Center, ColorInput, Slider, Input, Divider, Button, Checkbox, } from "@mantine/core"; import { IconCircleXFilled, IconAlignLeft, IconAlignCenter, IconAlignJustified, IconBold, IconUnderline, IconItalic, IconLetterN, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; const TextTemplate = () => { // const [value, setValue] = useState(50); // const [endValue, setEndValue] = useState(50); const [value, setValue] = useState(50); const handleChange = (newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; const handleIncrement = () => { const newValue = value + 1; if (newValue <= 100) { setValue(newValue); } }; return ( Text
Title Background Color Text Color Size Text Font Text Style Weight By setting justify to "flex-start," the Checkbox component will be aligned to the left within the Flex container. Padding Content Margin Content Back Button Radious Content ); }; export default TextTemplate;
